trans-unit.source: Returns detailed information about the schema exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException"></xref> class with the exception message specified.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.

Constructs a new <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaException" name="XmlSchemaException" href=""></xref> object with the given <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref> information that contains all the properties of the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaException" name="XmlSchemaException" href=""></xref>.
SerializationInfo.
StreamingContext.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException"></xref> class with the exception message and original <xref:System.Exception> object that caused this exception specified.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
The original T:System.Exception object that caused this exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException"></xref> class with the exception message specified, and the original <xref:System.Exception> object, line number, and line position of the XML that cause this exception specified.
A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> description of the error condition.
The original T:System.Exception object that caused this exception.
The line number of the XML that caused this exception.
The line position of the XML that caused this exception.

Streams all the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaException" name="XmlSchemaException" href=""></xref> properties into the <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref> class for the given <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_SerializationInfo" name="SerializationInfo" href=""></xref>.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StreamingContext" name="StreamingContext" href=""></xref> information.
Gets the line number indicating where the error occurred.
The line number indicating where the error occurred.
Gets the line position indicating where the error occurred.
The line position indicating where the error occurred.
Gets the description of the error condition of this exception.
The description of the error condition of this exception.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaObject" name="XmlSchemaObject" href=""></xref> that produced the <xref uid="langword_csharp_XmlSchemaException" name="XmlSchemaException" href=""></xref>.
This can be queried for the `LineNumber`, `LinePosition`, and `SourceUri` of the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema file.
A return value of `nil` indicates a syntactic parsing validation error in the SOM.
A valid object instance represents a structural validation error in the XML Schema Object Model (SOM).
Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) location of the schema that caused the exception.
The URI location of the schema that caused the exception.
